text:
ANN ARBOR
WUOM
91.7 M.C.
FLINT WFUM 107.1 M.C.
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
WALDO ABBOT, DIRECTOR OF BROADCASTING
ANN ARBOR. MICH.
E. G. BURROWS, program director
Mr* Harry Skornia
HAEB
Gregory Hall
13 June 1955
Urbana, Ill, ^
Dear Harry:
The last I heard from Jim Miles about the
forthcoming Chicago meeting of the NAEB PH committee,
there was a good chance you would help underwrite
our expenses,
I would like to ask you to send me the
necessary tax eapmption certificates so I can get
my transportation lined up.
Many thanks,
